dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4202 IH: Parity in Animal Cruelty Enforcement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Roskam (for himself, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Nolan, Mr. Sherman, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Yoder, Mr. Knight, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, and Mr. Buchanan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Animal Welfare Act to prohibit animal fighting in United States territories.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Parity in Animal Cruelty Enforcement Act or the PACE Act.

section.header: Extending prohibition on animal fighting to the territories
section.text: Section 26 of the Animal Welfare Act (7 U.S.C. 2156) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking Except as provided in paragraph (3), it and inserting It; and

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (e), (f), (g), (h), (i), and (j) as subsections (d), (e), (f), (g), (h), and (i), respectively.

section.header: Conforming amendments related to redesignated subsection

subsection.header: Use of Postal Service or Other Interstate Instrumentalities
subsection.text: Section 26(c) of the Animal Welfare Act (7 U.S.C. 2156(c)) is amended by striking (e) and inserting (d).
Subsection (i) of section 26 of the Animal Welfare Act (7 U.S.C. 2156), as redesignated by section 2(3), is amended by striking (e) and inserting (d).
Section 49(a) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking (e) and inserting (d).
